name: SWITCH|GLITCH
description:
A game made for the 48-hour U of Manitoba CSSA 2023 game jam.

What if you played the well-known browser dinosaur game, but you were in place of the dinosaur? Press the spacebar to jump and dodge the incoming obstacles.

Made by Karin Plavin, Kaylee Nguyen and Oleksandr Akimenko.

Gameplay tip: sometimes the game will cause a freeze jump instead of a normal jump; use it to your advantage! Jumping again or hanging above the obstacles may help you reach a high score...
